reserve this product for
your personal use and do
not dilute with water or
any other substance.

Directions from packaging:
Application: Apply 1-2 coats as desired. Begin from base of lashes to tips. Use tapered tip for lower lashes. Good for 6 months once opened.
Warnings from packaging:
CAUTION: HANDLE AND APPLY IN A CAREFUL SANITARY MANNER. DO NOT SHARE MASCARA, ADD ANYTHING TO MASCARA, PUT APPLICATOR ON ANY SURFACE, OR USE OLD APPLICATOR IN NEW CASE. IF CHANGE IN APPEARANCE AND/OR ODOR, DISCONTINUE USE. DO NOT USE MASCARA IF EYE IS INJURED, INFECTED, IRRITATED OR SCRATCHED. IN CASE OF IRRITATION, DISCONTINUE USE AND CONSULT A PHYSICIAN PROMPTLY. KEEP AWAY FROM SMALL CHILDREN.
